languages.text: All allies in the selected area also gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
languages.original_text: Все союзники в выбранной области получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g}.

traits.locale_text: All attacks by the allies in the selected area ignore 20% of the enemy's dodge and armour.
All attacks by the allies located in the selected area ignore 20% of the enemy's dodge and armour.
All attacks by the allies located in the selected area ignore 20% of the enemy's dodge and armour.
All allies in the selected area also gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

languages.text: 该区域内所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高20%。
languages.original_text: All allies in the selected area also gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 该区域内所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高20%。

languages.text: Todos los aliados de la zona elegida también ganan un +20% a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.
languages.original_text: All allies in the selected area also gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todos los ataques de los aliados en las zonas elegidas ignoran un 20 % de la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del enemigo.

languages.text: 選択したエリア内のすべての味方の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が+20%増加する。
languages.original_text: All allies in the selected area also gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 選択したエリア内のすべての味方の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が+20%増加する。

languages.text: Все союзники в выбранной области получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g}.
languages.original_text: All allies in the selected area also gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Все атаки союзников в выбранной области игнорируют 20% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} противника.

languages.text: Alle Verbündeten im ausgewählten Gebiet erlangen außerdem +20 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}.
languages.original_text: All allies in the selected area also gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Alle Angriffe von Verbündeten, die sich im ausgewählten Gebiet befinden, ignorieren 20 % von {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} der Feinde.

languages.text: Tous les alliés dans la zone sélectionnée bénéficient également d'une augmentation de 20 % à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction d'esquive{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Pénétration d'armure{/g}.
languages.original_text: All allies in the selected area also gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les attaques des alliés situés dans la zone sélectionnée ignorent 20 % de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de l'ennemi.
